QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, n.note_date, 'biomarker_status:' + isnull(n.biomarker_status, '') + ';variation_detail:' + isnull(n.variation_detail, '') + ';biomarker:' + isnull(n.biomarker, '') as note_text, 'NLP_BIOMARKERS' as note_title, 40639387 as language_concept_id from {sc}.nlp_biomarkers n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by 1
